resources.string:
Our holiday Home is located in Gottmadingen in south west Germany. 

 Up to five people can live in the apartement. You can also bring your kids. 

 The apartment includes a bedroom with a big bed for two, a living room with place for the other three beds, there is also a small bathroom and a kitchen with all the equipment you need 

 You also have access to a terrace where you can enjoy the sun. If you like you can also use the Garden behind the house. 

 About us: We are Susanne and Stefan Burger. Our four sons aren't here often anymore. 

 The holiday home is in our house but mostly cut off from the part we live in. 

 We also like to travel and know what kind of things you are looking for when living in a holiday home, so we try to provide everything we would want to have.
Welcome in Gottmadingen in the Hegau!
In our holiday home you can relax and explore the beautiful countryside, such as the Rheinfall or the Mainau. You can go for a swim in lake Konstanz or even go hiking in the alps.
